text: Remigio is a given name. Notable people with the given name include: *Remigio Guido Barbieri (1836–1910), Italian-born Roman Catholic bishop *Remigio Morales Bermúdez (1836–1894), Peruvian politician *Remigio Cantagallina (c. 1582–1656), Italian etcher *Remigio Fernández (born 1965), Paraguayan football manager and former footballer *Remigio dei Girolami (1235–1319), Italian Dominican theologian *Remigio Ángel González, Mexican businessman *Remigio Herrera (1811/1816– 1905), Cuban freedman *Remigio Molina (1970–2016), Argentine boxer *Remigio Crespo Toral (1860–1939), Ecuadorian writer ==See also== *Remigio (surname)
title: Remigio (given name)
